name: Strip Hidden SPAN Tags
description: Finds span tags with display:none styling and removes them.
content:
May 1, 2014

Dear Susan Sherwood
Student ID: 41637

Congratulations on your acceptance into the Bachelor of Business Administration program at Yorkville University.  Your official letter of admission has been sent to your mailing address on file.  You should receive it in the next couple of days.

In the meantime, here is important information to help you get ready to start your studies:

  • Credit Transfers: Any credit transfers that you received as part of the Admissions process are documented in a Statement of Credit Transfers and can be accessed at this link.

 

    • Start of Class: Classes start on Monday, July 7.  Your first courses are:
        • BUSI1073 Business Writing and Communication
        • BUSI1033 Introduction to Business
    • N/A N/A

          • Understanding Canadian Business (ISBN #9781259066627)
